q1: What do you think about Italy not making it to the World Cup?
a1: Even more surprising than the US not making it!
q2: Why do you think they didn't make it this year?
a2: Italy had poor management and relied too much on older players.
q3: What should they do to develop youth players?
a3: Need to develop infrastructure and academies for young players.
a4: Cali is there best player ever
q5: He is before my time, but they consistently have good defenders.
a5: Yes they have good defenders more than attackers
